text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia megerlei is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell grows to a length of 1.5 mm
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
European waters (ERMS scope)
Portuguese Exclusive Economic Zone
Spanish Exclusive Economic Zone
United Kingdom Exclusive Economic Zone
Mediterranean Sea
text.External links:
"Odostomia (Brachystomia) megerlei". Gastropods.com. Retrieved 14 November 2011.
